last_episode_to_air.name: Check Yo' Slack Every 5 to Stay Alive
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Coral Reefs vie for office space. A new employee creates work-wife drama. A ballet dancer auditions for a trap rapper.

name: A Black Lady Sketch Show
overview: A narrative series set in a limitless magical reality full of dynamic, hilarious characters and celebrity guests presenting sketches performed by a core cast of black women.

episodes.name: Angela Bassett Is the Baddest Bitch
episodes.overview: Maya makes a confession in a support group. Trinity the Invisible Spy meets her match. Drea confronts a dance moves thief. A world-renowned “philosophizer” promotes her masterclass.

episodes.name: Your Boss Knows You Don't Have Eyebrows
episodes.overview: Shayla forgoes her makeup to her coworker’s dismay. Trinity hunts down an elusive villain known as The Recluse. Contestants perform at the Basic Ball.

episodes.name: 3rd & Bonaparte Is Always in the Shade
episodes.overview: Asia finds herself on the receiving end of a viral proposal. New recruits discuss goals at a gang orientation. Dr. Haddassah turns a wedding toast into a teachable moment.

episodes.name: Where Are My Background Singers?
episodes.overview: A divorce party spirals out of control. The tragic tale of Rome & Julissa. A frustrated air passenger seeks a sympathetic customer service rep. Denise tries to prevent her breakup side-effect.

episodes.name: Why Are Her Pies Wet, Lord?
episodes.overview: A pastor tries to take back control of a church potluck. Elementary school students notice a change in their teacher. Jackie receives a chilly reception at her hometown high school.

episodes.name: Born at Night, But Not Last Night
episodes.overview: Two friends visit a new black-owned business. A mother and daughter compete on “Get the Belt.” Tensions rise between Ashley, Gabrielle, Quinta and Robin.

episodes.name: But the Tilapias Are Fine Though, Right?
episodes.overview: Dr. Haddassah breaks her silence; Salina visits a psychic.

episodes.name: So You Just Out Here Chloroforming Anybody?
episodes.overview: On their trip to Fiji, a group of girlfriends face first-class confusion; Bryanni unleashes her trademark twerking skills.

episodes.name: Sister, May I Call You Oshun?
episodes.overview: A gender reveal party loses its focus; Portia takes issue with her takeout.

episodes.name: My Booty Look Juicy, Don't It?
episodes.overview: Tiffany confronts insomnia; friends stage an intervention.

episodes.name: If I'm paying these Chili's prices, you cannot taste my steak!
episodes.overview: A freshman navigates her first cafeteria lunch; a motivational speaker rouses a crowd; a woman tries a promising new hair salon.

episodes.name: Way to Ruin the Party, Soya!
episodes.overview: A woman on a date faces tough questions; friends split the check; a couple braves a family reunion.

episodes.name: Save My Edges, I’m a Donor!
episodes.overview: A neighborhood gets pumped for the annual Product Purge; Dr. Haddassah takes on Career Day; Keisha bombs at a comedy club.

episodes.name: Anybody Have Something I Can Flog Myself With?
episodes.overview: Ms. Miller’s class learns about her fiancé; Jocelyn and Dee-Dee welcome a new member to the friend group..

episodes.name: Y'all Want Some Blood Juice?
episodes.overview: Amanda delivers the Black hair weather forecast; a bachelorette party gets wild; two moms butt heads at a spelling bee.

episodes.name: Bounce Them Coochies, Y’all!
Peaches and Eggplants for Errbody!
It’s a New Day, Africa America!
I'm Clapping From My Puss
episodes.overview: A girls’ trip gets off to a bumpy start. Three women attempt catch up to the Three Wise Men. Salina tries to defeat her childhood nemesis.

episodes.name: What Kind of Medicine Does Dr. King Practice?
episodes.overview: Kimber and Skip host a baptism dunk-a-thon. Coworkers vent about their jobs. Gia is a menace at the movies. Annie interviews for preschool.

episodes.name: Pre Ph.D, Based on a Novel by Sapphire
episodes.overview: Dr. Haddassah returns with Black Table Talk. Karlie Chanel pitches TV executives. A mother passes down her prized heirlooms.

episodes.name: My Love Language Is Words of Defamation
episodes.overview: A Black Lady Courtroom hears a new case. A queen’s knights share gossip from around the kingdom. A waitress riles up her customers.

episodes.name: Peek-A-Boob, Your T***y's Out
episodes.overview: Cousin Curtis mans a hotel front desk. A woman’s hot date with herself gets interrupted. Three friends compete for a picture-perfect life.

episodes.name: Check Yo' Slack Every 5 to Stay Alive
episodes.overview: The Coral Reefs vie for office space. A new employee creates work-wife drama. A ballet dancer auditions for a trap rapper.
